availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, tailor and merchant. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah D. Fitzgerald. Father of Frances G. Fitzgerald, John A. Fitzgerald, Sarah D. Fitzgerald, Flora V. Fitzgerald, Lucretia C. Fitzgerald, Henry G. Fitzgerald, Joseph B. LaCount Fitzgerald, and Winfield Fitzgerald. Tailor in Henry County in 1850. Merchant in Henry County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, District 1, p. 364A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, New Castle, p. 242.
Find A Grave, "David Fitzgerald (1813-1870)," Memorial 65601523, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/65601523 (accessed March 6, 2020).
